scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync public/ s3://TODO/ --delete --profile TODO
scripts.deploycontent: aws s3 sync public/ s3://TODO/ --delete --cache-control "max-age=3600, public" --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --include "*.xml"
scripts.deployothers: aws s3 sync public/ s3://TODO/ --delete --cache-control "max-age=86400, public" --exclude "*.html" --exclude "*.xml"
